sentences.en: A student over sixteen reckons as two under eleven in the calculation of school building costs.
sentences.cn: 在计算学校的建筑费用时,一名16岁以上的学生作为两个11岁以下的学生计算.

sentences.en: After much calculation, they decided to give Phil the position of manager.
sentences.cn: 经过慎重考虑后, 他们决定给费尔经理的职位.

sentences.en: By my calculation(s), we made a profit of £20 000 last year.
sentences.cn: 我算了一下，我们去年赢利2万英镑。
凯茜作了一个粗略的计算。

sentences.en: Graham made a quick mental calculation.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆很快就心算出来了。

sentences.en: He is absorbed in the calculation of that difficult maths problem.
sentences.cn: 他全神贯注地在算那道数学难题.

sentences.en: His actions were clearly the result of deliberate calculation.
sentences.cn: 他的行动显然是精心策划过的.

sentences.en: Laboratory work needs not only accurate measurements but also correct calculation.
sentences.cn: 实验工作不但需要准确的测量,而且需要准确的计算.

sentences.en: Leonard made a rapid calculation: he'd never make it in time.
sentences.cn: 伦纳德快速盘算了一下：他肯定赶不上了。

sentences.en: Let's make a check on his calculation.
sentences.cn: 让我们复核一下他的计算结果.

sentences.en: My calculation is based on notional figures, since the actual figures are not yet available.
sentences.cn: 因尚无实际数字,我是根据估计的数字计算的.

sentences.en: Our guess was confirmed by calculation.
sentences.cn: 我们的猜测通过计算得到证实。

sentences.en: She did a rapid calculation in her head.
sentences.cn: 她在脑中快速预测了一番.

sentences.en: The machine will print out the results of the calculation and the names of suitable books on this subject.
sentences.cn: 机器将打出计算结果及适合此课题的书目.

sentences.en: The machine will read out the result of the calculation.
We cannot make a precise calculation of the price until we have all the costs.
sentences.cn: 除非我们知道所有成本,否则不能准确地计算出价格.

sentences.en: You mustn't do things without calculation.

words.tran_cn: 可计算的；能预测的；可靠的
计算出的；适合的；有计划的
计算的；深谋远虑的；审慎的
计算的，善于计算的；精明的
计算；估计；打算（calculate的过去式和过去分词）
[数]计算；估计；计算的结果；深思熟虑

phrases.tran_cn: 反算，反算法；反演计算；回算
布尔运算；逻辑代数运算
计算方法；计算程序；计算方案
设计计算资料，设计计算书
性能计算，特性计算；功率计算

trans.tran_en: A calculation is something that you think about and work out mathematically. Calculation is the process of working something out mathematically.
